name: Meatman
description:
What do you know about fashion idols? Whether you think of fashion as something pure and beautiful, daring and fierce or hideous and confusing, we've got the perfect candidate for you. And that candidate is Meatman!

In Meatman you'll step into the shoes of the loveable, charming flesh of Meatman, entering the strange but fascinating world of fashion! Meatman has always dreamed of becoming a fashion idol, and you don't want to dissapoint Meatman now, do you?

Create your look based on the topic the judges will present to you, the world of fashion changes rapidly, so prepare to deliver based on different topics each run!

And what would a fashion contest be without showing off a little bit of your talent? The judges want you to be fierce? Well then your performance has to scream F I E R C E !

Now go out there and make us proud!

Key features:

  • Explore many different types of outfits and build your own Meatman!
  • Fashion feedback system that keeps track of exactly HOW fashionable you really are!
  • Strict judges that will tear you apart (not literally, but emotionally) if you fail to deliver high fashion!
  • A fun talent show that varies based on the topic given! Whoa!
  • Tons of beautiful (but also strange) looks for Meatman!
  • And who could forget the best feature of this game? The Man. The Legend. Meatman himself!

Controls:

This game can be played only with your mouse, why are you using your keyboard? You stop that right now!

We hope you enjoy the journey into the world of Meatman!

This game started out as a Prototype and has been made possible by four people during a University project:

Philippe & Katherine (programming)

Florian & Jana (art)
